description: A principal is either a user or a group (team)

id.description: The id of either the user or group.

principalName.description: The unique name of this principal.

email.description: Currently, this only applies to users and will be removed from principals in the future.

isIndividual.description: True if this is a user, false if it is a group

etag.description: Used to detect when a client's current representation of a user or group is out-of-date.

creationDate.description: The date this principal was created.s
creationDate.title: Created On
